locale.name: English (US)
command.help.response: [36mlist [<entries page> <entries per page> <entry filter json...>][0m - list all objects in the current path
[36mselect [database/table name...][0m - select an object in the current path
[36madd [database/table name...][0m - add an object to the current path
[36mdelete [database name/table name/entry filter json...][0m - delete an object in the current path
[36mrename [database/table name...][0m - rename an object in the current path
[36mmodify [entry filter...][0m - modify table entries matched by the filter
